How to install....  
After downloading this files, do the following ( ignore if you have step 1 & 2 )
1.-First of all Install Daemon tools in your computer...
2.- Install Winrar in your computer....
3.-After that , go to  the main Folder and select the rzr-cod4.001 file, click right button , select open and then select Extract here......it will create a 6 GB file.
4.-With Deamon tools mount  that file ( the 6 GB files ) 
5.-The installation will start.... but it will ask for the KEY
6.-DOwnload the new crackfix and keygen by razor1911 ( HE IS THE MAN!!!) ...look for the torrent .... don´t be slackers!!
7.- After downloading the file , in the main folder select rzr-cd4f, click right button  and extract...some new files will be created...one of them the Key gen and the crack.exe
8.-open Key gen and copy the key to the slots...
9.-Installation will continue...
10.- from that same folder , copy the crack.exe and  paste it in the installed file .
11.... ENJOY......
Thanks RAZOR 1911!!!

WELL I KNOW A LOT OF PEOPLE DONT KNOW HOW TO INSTALL IT .SO IM GONNA EXPLAIN HOW TO AS SYMPLE AS I CAN!:P
1.Download WinRAR
2.open the folder with all the rzr-cod4.001 etc
3.Select the rzr-cod4.001 and press open
4.Microsoft will probably not know with witch program to open it with .So press browse and the go to c:\programfiles\WinRaR\Winrar.exe
5.Let it extract it to the folder with the other files
6.You need to download daemon tools .Just google it its free
7.Once youve installed daemon tools lite ,there should be a red icon  on the bottom of your screen.Left click it and it should pop up a little message Click on that then search for the file you exported a litlle while ago .it should be in the folder with all the other rzr-cod4.002 etc .
8.If all goes well you should be playing cod4 in no time!
